parameters:
\N<Segi>It's okay... The power of Mind Luda is working. It's giving
my body a strong anti-toxin effect.

\N<Segi>Luda's spiritual medicine that brings both physical
enhancement and aphrodisiac effects... I mustn't think about
anything now... I'll use whatever I can...
\N<Segi>If it becomes the sustenance to save Lord Yuia...

There are strange creatures within the ruins that are
enemies to Segi, but contact with them will not result in a
game over unless you take slip damage.

However, under certain conditions, if she is injured and
collapses, some kind of danger may befall her.

Also, among the roaming enemies and treasure chests, there
are individuals with special colors.

These have a random element but generally offer better
rewards compared to individuals of normal color.
